mapper.select: select cg.id,cg.title,cg.province,cg.city,cg.district,cg.address_name,cg.address_detail as address,cg.address_longitude,cg.address_latitude,cui.nick_name as leader,cc.college_name as college,cg.cotenant_count,cg.cotenant_type,cg.house_price,cg.house_type,cg.status,cg.chamber_img_url,cg.created_time,cg.cotenant_description,cg.chamber_description from cotenant_group cg join cotenant_group_user cgu on cgu.cotenant_group_id = cg.id join cotenant_user_info cui on cui.user_id = cgu.cotenant_user_id left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where cgu.role=1 order by cg.created_time desc

select cg.id,cg.title,cg.province,cg.city,cg.district,cg.address_name,cg.address_detail,cg.address_longitude,cg.address_latitude,cui.nick_name as leader,cui.user_id as leader_id,cui.sex,cc.college_name as college,cui.end_time,cg.cotenant_count,cg.cotenant_type,cg.house_type,cg.toilte_type,cg.kitchen_type,cg.house_price,cg.status,cg.chamber_img_url,cg.cotenant_description,cg.chamber_description,cg.chamber_video_url,cg.created_time from cotenant_group cg join cotenant_group_user cgu on cgu.cotenant_group_id = cg.id join cotenant_user_info cui on cui.user_id = cgu.cotenant_user_id left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where cgu.status = 10 and cgu.role=1 and cg.id = #{id}

select cg.id,cg.title,cg.province,cg.city,cg.district,cg.address_name,cg.address_detail,cg.address_longitude,cg.address_latitude,cui.nick_name as leader,cui.user_id as leader_id,cui.sex,cc.college_name as college,cui.end_time,cg.cotenant_count,cg.cotenant_type,cg.house_type,cg.toilte_type,cg.kitchen_type,cg.house_price,cg.status,cg.chamber_img_url,cg.cotenant_description,cg.chamber_description,cg.chamber_video_url,cg.created_time from cotenant_group cg join cotenant_group_user cgu on cgu.cotenant_group_id = cg.id join cotenant_user_info cui on cui.user_id = cgu.cotenant_user_id left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where cgu.role=1 and cg.id = #{id}

select cui.user_id,role,cui.nick_name,cgu.status,cc.college_name as college,cuc.end_time,cui.interest,cui.sex from cotenant_group_user cgu join cotenant_user_info cui on cui.user_id = cgu.cotenant_user_id left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where cgu.cotenant_group_id = #{id} and cgu.status = 10 order by cgu.role
select cotenant_user_id from cotenant_group_user where cotenant_group_id = #{groupId} and role = 1
select count(1) from cotenant_group_user where cotenant_user_id = #{userId} and (status = 0 or status = 10)
